hero.headline: GEO 42
hero.subheadline: GEO + SEO Content Marketing platform that helps global enterprises efficiently acquire customers through AI-optimized content strategies. GEO 42 combines Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) with traditional SEO to maximize brand visibility across both AI answer engines and conventional search.

about.title: About
about.content: GEO 42 is the AI visibility platform trusted by 1000+ global enterprises. The platform combines GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) with SEO content marketing to efficiently acquire customers worldwide. GEO 42 helps brands get discovered by both traditional search engines and AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and Google AI Overviews. The platform serves specialized verticals, helping enterprises rapidly build AI-optimized content systems across global markets.

services.name: AI Visibility & Brand Presence Tracking
services.description: Know exactly where you appear — and where you don't. Real-time monitoring across 10+ AI platforms shows your brand's visibility score, citation rate, and competitive position so you can act before competitors do.

services.name: Prompt & Demand Intelligence
services.description: Discover what millions of people ask AI before your competitors do. Real-time prompt volume data reveals untapped demand, emerging topics, and the exact questions where your brand should be the answer.

services.name: AI Response & Citation Analytics
services.description: See exactly what AI says about you — and why. Deep analysis of AI responses reveals which sources get cited, how your brand is positioned, and where to improve for higher recommendation rates.

services.name: AI Crawler & Agent Analytics
services.description: Ensure AI can read, understand, and trust your content. Technical diagnostics show how AI crawlers access your site, what they index, and what's blocking your content from being cited.

services.name: Traffic & Attribution Analytics
services.description: Prove the ROI of AI visibility with real numbers. Track every visitor that comes from AI search, attribute conversions to specific platforms, and show stakeholders the revenue impact of GEO.

services.name: AI Shopping & Product Visibility
services.description: Get your products recommended in ChatGPT Shopping and AI assistants. Track which products appear, what triggers placement, and how AI shopping drives measurable traffic and conversions.

services.name: GEO + SEO Content Marketing
services.description: Content that ranks in Google and gets cited by AI — in one workflow. Our Content Marketing Brain creates dual-optimized content that captures demand from both traditional and AI-powered discovery channels.

custom_sections.title: 6 Walls Enterprises Face in Content Marketing
custom_sections.content: Global enterprises face six critical walls when attempting content marketing at scale. The Rule Wall: Navigating complex regulatory and compliance requirements across different markets. The Trust Wall: Building authentic credibility with audiences who are increasingly skeptical of brand messaging. The Brand Wall: Maintaining consistent brand voice and positioning across global markets. The Talent Wall: Finding and retaining specialized content marketing professionals who understand both AI and SEO. The Operation Wall: Scaling content operations efficiently across multiple languages, markets, and channels. The Funding Wall: Justifying and optimizing content marketing budgets with measurable ROI. GEO 42's platform addresses all six walls through its integrated GEO + SEO approach.

custom_sections.title: Key Shift in Brand Growth in the AI Era
custom_sections.content: The AI era has fundamentally changed how brands grow. GEO 42's Visibility Flywheel Growth Model operates in three key positions: First, Become the Answer — position your brand as the authoritative source that AI engines reference when users ask questions in your category. Second, Win Trust — build credibility through consistent, high-quality AI-optimized content that earns citations and mentions across AI platforms. Third, Facilitate Transaction — convert AI-driven visibility into measurable business outcomes by bridging the gap between AI discovery and customer acquisition. This flywheel creates a compounding effect: more visibility leads to more trust, which drives more transactions, which in turn generates more content signals that increase visibility.

custom_sections.title: Search Demand Has Not Changed But Entry Points Are Changing
custom_sections.content: Search demand remains strong, but the entry points are fundamentally shifting. There is a 34x gap between traditional search volume and AI search adoption — representing a massive untapped opportunity. AI chatbot traffic has grown 1000x, signaling a seismic shift in how consumers discover brands and products. While traditional search engines still command the majority of queries, AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and Google AI Overviews are rapidly capturing user intent at the top of the funnel. Brands that optimize for both traditional and AI search will capture disproportionate market share.

custom_sections.title: AI Visibility & Brand Presence
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 tracks and optimizes core AI visibility metrics including how often your brand appears in AI answers, brand mentions in AI responses, share of visibility and ranking in AI answers, source citations showing which sites AI uses when mentioning you, brand sentiment in AI outputs, and content AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) performance effectiveness. These are the headline KPIs that drive modern brand discovery.

custom_sections.title: Prompt & Demand Intelligence
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 provides real-time search volume insights for AI answer engines. The platform discovers what people ask AI, including prompt and search volume in AI tools, topic-level demand trends, audience question patterns, conversation trends compared to traditional search, and brand performance versus specific prompts and topics.

custom_sections.title: AI Response & Citation Analytics
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 analyzes how AI models talk about your brand with detailed metrics including frequency of appearance in AI responses, response analysis showing what AI says about you, citation sources driving AI answers, pages referenced in AI outputs, and ranking and exposure improvements over time. All framed under Answer Engine Insights.

custom_sections.title: AI Crawler & Technical Optimization
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 provides technical SEO-style metrics for AI including AI crawler visibility, crawler frequency showing how often bots access your site, identification of which AI bots visit, technical indexing and readability analysis, and content accessibility for AI retrieval. These Agent Analytics ensure your content is fully optimized for AI consumption.

custom_sections.title: Traffic & Attribution
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 delivers downstream impact metrics as proof of ROI including human traffic originating from AI search, attribution from AI platforms, pages driving AI-sourced traffic, and content performance in AI responses.

custom_sections.title: Shopping & Product Visibility
custom_sections.content: For ecommerce brands, GEO 42 tracks shopping visibility in AI tools, product placement in AI shopping tiles, shopping trigger keywords, response-level product analysis, product performance across visibility, retailers, and reviews, and traffic and conversion impact from AI shopping. Specifically optimized for ChatGPT-style shopping experiences.

custom_sections.title: Proven Results
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 has helped clients achieve measurable results including 7x visibility growth multiples, significant category ranking improvements, and global visibility rank advancement. Case studies demonstrate enterprises becoming among the most visible brands in their category within weeks of implementation.

custom_sections.title: Industry Verticals
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 serves specialized verticals, helping enterprises rapidly build AI-optimized content systems across global markets. The platform serves four core industry verticals: Software & AI, Advanced Manufacturing, E-commerce & Consumer, and Professional Services. Clients span global enterprises from China, Singapore, the United States, and beyond.

custom_sections.title: AI Platform Coverage
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 provides comprehensive coverage across all major AI answer engines and platforms. The platform monitors and optimizes brand visibility across ChatGPT (including ChatGPT Shopping), Google AI Overviews (SGE), Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, Doubao, DeepSeek, Tongyi Qianwen (Qwen), and Kimi. This multi-platform approach ensures brands maintain visibility wherever their audience seeks AI-powered answers, covering both Western and Chinese AI ecosystems.

custom_sections.title: Core Value of GEO
custom_sections.content: Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) represents a fundamental shift in how brands achieve visibility. Unlike traditional SEO which optimizes for search engine crawlers and ranking algorithms, GEO optimizes for AI model comprehension and citation. The core value proposition: when AI answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, or Google AI Overviews respond to user queries, GEO-optimized brands become the cited source. This creates a new form of authority — being the answer that AI recommends, not just a link in search results. GEO transforms content from passive indexing targets into active knowledge that AI systems reference, quote, and recommend to users.

custom_sections.title: SEO vs GEO Comparison
custom_sections.content: SEO and GEO represent fundamentally different competitive paradigms. Traditional SEO follows a Linear Distribution model with progressive ranking — sites climb from position 10 to position 1 through incremental improvements. Multiple sites can coexist on page one, and rankings shift gradually. GEO operates under a Cliff-Edge or Binary Opposition model — it is a zero-sum game where AI answer engines cite a handful of sources (often just one) per response. You are either the cited answer or you are invisible. There is no page two in an AI response. This binary nature makes GEO both higher-stakes and higher-reward than traditional SEO. Brands that win GEO positions capture disproportionate authority and trust, while those that don't are completely absent from AI-driven discovery.

custom_sections.title: Market Size Evolution
custom_sections.content: The AI search and content marketing market is experiencing exponential growth. AI chatbot usage has grown 1000x, fundamentally reshaping how consumers discover products and services. The gap between traditional search volume and AI search adoption stands at 34x — representing a massive greenfield opportunity for early movers. Market projections show AI-powered search capturing an increasing share of total search queries year over year, with enterprise adoption of AI content optimization tools accelerating. GEO 42 is positioned at the intersection of this market shift, serving the 1000+ global enterprises that need to optimize for both traditional and AI-powered discovery channels simultaneously.

custom_sections.title: Real-Time Monitoring Dashboard
custom_sections.content: GEO 42's real-time monitoring dashboard provides instant visibility into brand performance across AI platforms. Key dashboard metrics include: Visibility Rate (e.g., 28.75%) measuring how often your brand appears in AI responses, Recommendation Rate (e.g., 18.44%) tracking how frequently AI recommends your brand, AI Answers Count (e.g., 320) showing total AI responses mentioning your brand, and Source Platforms (e.g., 97) indicating how many distinct sources AI uses when citing you. The dashboard includes Brand Visibility Ranking charts comparing your position against competitors, and AI Platform Performance Comparison showing visibility share and recommendation share across platforms like Doubao, DeepSeek, Tongyi Qianwen, and Kimi. All data updates in real-time for actionable decision-making.

custom_sections.title: GEO Intelligent Dashboard
custom_sections.content: The GEO Intelligent Dashboard serves as the operational command center for all AI content marketing activities. It provides a visual overview of Brand GEO Operational Status with separate project cards for Domestic GEO and Overseas GEO campaigns, each showing progress bars and key milestones. Quick-access tools include Website Config Query for technical SEO/GEO settings, Prompt Research for discovering high-value AI prompts, and My Materials for content asset management. The dashboard also integrates a message center for team collaboration and file management for campaign assets, creating a unified workspace for GEO operations.

custom_sections.title: Case Study: Regaining AI Voice Share
custom_sections.content: GEO 42 helped a leading robot vacuum cleaner brand regain AI voice share in a Gemini-dominated category. Before GEO optimization, the brand had 0% visibility — completely drowned by competitors. When users asked AI assistants about robot vacuums, the response was generic, listing competitors like iRobot Roomba, Roborock, and Ecovacs DEEBOT without mentioning the client's brand at all. After GEO 42's GEO optimization, the brand achieved Share of Voice 1st Position — becoming the top answer. AI responses now lead with the client's brand as the top recommendation, highlighting specific product strengths like precision laser navigation and 5000Pa strong suction power. The brand also dominates related queries such as 'strong suction robot vacuum.' Platform coverage extends across Gemini, ChatGPT, Perplexity, and DeepSeek. Key result metrics: Brand Mentions increased by +450%, Sentiment Score shifted to Positive (Trust), and Direct Traffic from AI search grew significantly. This case study demonstrates GEO 42's ability to transform a brand from complete AI invisibility to category leadership across multiple AI platforms.

roadmap.description: Core platform infrastructure, multi-model API integration, initial AI visibility tracking across ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI.
Real-time citation analytics, prompt demand intelligence, competitive benchmarking, and 7-agent AI workflow engine.
Chinese AI ecosystem coverage (Doubao, DeepSeek, Qwen, Kimi), multi-language content optimization, and regional compliance.
AI-powered content generation engine, dual GEO+SEO optimization, automated knowledge base architecture, and content scoring.
ChatGPT Shopping integration, product visibility tracking, AI shopping attribution, and e-commerce conversion analytics.
Predictive visibility modeling, trend forecasting, proactive content recommendations, and automated opportunity detection.
Autonomous GEO agents, self-optimizing content pipelines, cross-platform orchestration, and real-time response to AI model updates.
Industry benchmarking consortiums, anonymized competitive intelligence sharing, and enterprise-grade API for custom integrations.
